title: East Asian economic prominence in 20th century

content.question: The rise to economic prominence of many East Asian nations in the 1980s and 1990s entailed

choices.label: the creation of the Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere by Japan
the emphasis on producing high-value consumer goods for export
the dominance of Chinaâ€™s Four Modernizations policy
huge imports of oil, cars, and electronics into the region from the United States
the decline of the European Economic Community

content.answer: the emphasis on producing high-value consumer goods for export

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
